welcomeTextUser:
The lastbit go app is designed to work with lastbit hardware to instantly spend crypto anywhere.

Get started by picking an option below
welcomeTextMerchant:
Accept instant bitcoin payments at your establishment with zero fees!

Get started in minutes by picking an option below.
backupMnemonicText:
Please write down these words in a secure location (Not on this phone).

If you lose access to this wallet, you will need these words in exactly this sequence to recover your funds.
importMnemonicText: Enter your 24 word recovery secret to restore your wallet on this device.
passphraseText: Set a memorable passphrase. You will not be able to back this up from the application.
passphraseWarning: Attention! You will need this passphrase to recover this wallet.
verifyMnemonicText: Please enter the corresponding words from the list of words previously displayed.
skipText: It is highly recommended that you backup your wallet to ensure that your funds are safe.
enterPinText: Set a memorable PIN to secure your funds. You will need this PIN to unlock your wallet.
receiveBTCSubtitle: Share your address to receive a payment
emptyLNWallet:
Your lightning wallet is empty
Deposit some funds first
depositText: Once you have broadcasted the deposit transaction, go back and refresh your transactions to fetch your latest balance
deviceTxTitle: Complete this transaction on your lastbit Go.
showLastbitIdSubtitle: Send money instantly to other lastbit users without requesting them for an invoice!
moveConf: Are you sure you want to
comingSoonMsg: Hold tight. Something super cool is coming!
wipeWarning: Are you sure you want to wipe data? It is recommended to backup your wallet before doing this.
permissionsPromptTextBLE: This App needs access to your location for bluetooth low energy services.
successExportMsg: The 24 recovery words have been copied to your clipboard.
successWifExport: The WIF wallet format has been copied to your clipboard.
successCopyInvoiceMsg: Your invoice has been copied to your clipboard.
successCopylastbitIDMsg: Your lastbit ID has been copied to the clipboard.
successPinChangeMsg: Please use the new PIN code to secure your lastbit wallet.
successTxBroadcastMsg: You will receive your change shortly. Alternatively use our lightning solution for instant settlements!
successDepositMsg: Your funds will be on lightning soon
successWithdrawalMsg: Your funds will be available in your bitcoin wallet soon
errEmptyFeedbackMsg: Please enter some feedback before submitting.
errInvalidEmailMsg: Please double check the email address that you have entered.
errNoInternet: Please check your internet connection and try again.
errNoBalanceMsg: Please ensure you have a non-zero balance. Receive some money into your wallet before you make a transaction.
errInvalidAddress: Please enter a valid testnet bitcoin address
errInvalidAmount: Please enter a valid non zero amount
errPayFailMsg: Please ensure your input is valid and that you have sufficient funds.
errFractionalSatsMsg: You cannot enter a decimal value for satoshis, much like having half a cent. A satoshi is the smallest divisible unit on the bitcoin network.
errSamePinMsg: Cannot set new PIN to existing PIN.
errImportInvalidMnemonicMsg: Enter a valid wallet recovery mnemonic.
errWithdrawInvalidAddr: Please enter a valid testnet bitcoin address to withdraw to.
errDepositNoBalance: You have no funds in your Onchain wallet available for Deposit. Fund your lastbit wallet from the HomeScreen
errWithdrawNoBalance: You have no funds in your Lightning wallet available for Withdrawal. Deposit some funds first.
warnUpdateInfoMsg: Please wait while your balance and transactions are being updated.
warnUnsafeMobileMsg:
It is unsafe to store your keys on a device with constant network access.

We are building a hardware solution for isolated key storage.
promptValidInvoice: Please submit a valid lightning invoice
errInvoiceTooLargeMsg: Invoice amount should be less than
lnInfoText: The Lightning Network is built on top of bitcoin to allow for transactions to be settled instantly between the parties involved.
toPayLN: to pay for your purchases on the Lightning Network
touchIDText: Biometric authentication for your lastbit wallet.
errorDuplicateHID: Unfortunately, this ID has already been reserved by another lastbit user
errorInvalidHID: lastbit ID must be alphanumeric. No special characters allowed!
